front.title: American National Standard for Determination of the Imaging Performance of X-Ray and Gamma-Ray Systems for Cargo and Vehicle Security Screening

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard is intended to be used to determine the imaging performance of X-ray and gamma-ray systems utilized to inspect loaded or empty vehicles, including personal and commercial vehicles of any type; marine and air cargo containers of any size; railroad cars; and palletized or unpalletized cargo larger than 1 m times 1 m in cross-section.
